detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract YDFIfinance (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YDFIfinance.sol#88-206) has payable functions:
	 - YDFIfinance.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YDFIfinance.sol#195-197)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :

	 - [YDFIfinance.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YDFIfinance.sol#L195-L197)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
